thread.title: Alexander’s Patisserie brings European flavor to Mountain View

author: Anh-Minh Le
title: Alexander’s Patisserie brings European flavor to Mountain View
text:

Executive pastry chef Dries Delanghe makes strawberry tarts with...
In Dries Delanghe’s native Belgium, it’s common for schoolchildren to choose a specific course of study after primary school. So, when he was 12 years old, his parents asked him what he wanted to do. Baking and pastry school, he told them. Worried that he would burn out at a young age, his mother and stepfather, who own a frites business, steered him in another direction. Executive pastry chef Dries Delanghe makes strawberry tarts with basil citrus cream at Alexander’s Patisserie. Executive pastry chef Dries Delanghe makes strawberry tarts with...
In Dries Delanghe’s native Belgium, it’s common for schoolchildren to choose a specific course of study after primary school. So, when he was 12 years old, his parents asked him what he wanted to do. Baking and pastry school, he told them. Worried that he would burn out at a young age, his mother and stepfather, who own a frites business, steered him in another direction.
